Room.Name: CrossRoads
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the crossroads of a wide path and a small road.
Room.LongDescription: The path goes through very thick woods to the north, while the small road heads east and southwest. Wagon tracks have made ruts in the road, but it appears to be easy to walk. A small rest area with a wooden table is on the south side of the road. A road sign says the city of Oceancrest is to the southwest, and the home of Khallazar is to the east. The elven city of Hafnia is far to the northeast.
